Others: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 13 assists, and 12 rebounds in a 116-106 win over the Philadelphia 76ers.
Anthony Davis had 31 points, 9 rebounds, and 4 blocks in the game.
The Lakers ended their four-game losing streak with the win.
The 76ers fell to 1-7 with the loss, as they were without Joel Embiid and Tyrese Maxey.
